item.title: @elonmusk: Tell him to run outside. Get muddy. Get curious. Take things apart. Build something that barely work...
item.description: Tell him to run outside. Get muddy. Get curious. Take things apart. Build something that barely works, then make it better. Stir up just enough trouble to earn a few good stories. Read great books. Ask big questions. Forget college and the stressful admissions rat race. Weâ€™ll be here when heâ€™s ready to take one test and send the score.
